name: Coin Monopoly
description:
PLAY THE GAME HERE: https://simmer.io/@ShengXue/coin-monopoly

Fullscreen link: https://i.simmer.io/@ShengXue/coin-monopoly

Download the game for a better experience.

Objective: 

Collect the most coins to win. Red coins give 1 point, gold coins give 10 points. Gold coins only spawn on the four corners. Each time your enemy dies, half of his/her coins are dropped and your skill level increase (Your gun becomes more powerful!) Collect health packs to regain health. 

This game is made to be "snowbally" so that it is often that one of the players wins by a lot.

Game Controls:

Player 1 Controls: WASD, G- shoot, H- laser, J- rush, K- shield

Player 2 Controls: Arrow keys, NUM1- shoot, NUM2- laser, NUM3- rush, NUM4- shield

Team:

Group Name: Coin Monopoly

Sim Sheng Xue (shengxue#4150) from NUS
